member.name: T:ASSIST_Extensions.CreateEventsLogger
member.summary: Creates an event logger using the specified

member.name: M:ASSIST_Extensions.CreateEventsLogger.CreaterEventLogger(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the event logger of Log name and Source datasource if the Log doesn't exist. Otherwise uses the exist event log with the same name. If no log is specified, it uses the default Application Log.
member.param: The source. This goes into the DataSource column
The log. This is the name of the log the events are written to.

member.name: M:ASSIST_Extensions.CreateEventsLogger.GetEvents``1(System.String,System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Accepts an Event Log Name and log level. Returns all log entries for that Event Log and level The default log (if none is specified) is the Application log and default log level is FailueAudit
